name: Silvestria
description:
In Silvestria, you take on the role of Silvester, a squirrel that got swept away by a river during a storm. You wake up downstream in unfamiliar territory. With the help of the local animals, you’ll embark on a journey to bring the oak and the forest back to life. Plant and care for trees, explore new areas, and discover seeds and artifacts from the past. Together, you'll restore the forest and create a new home for Silvester and all their friends in this cozy exploration adventure game!

PLEASE NOTE:

* Most things in the game are subject to change

* The farming/management gameplay is currently being developed

The following music was used in this project:

Spring by Frank Schroeter
